Growbotix
Personal
Making the world a better place through organic vegtable and fruit growing.
An IoT based company that leverages open source hardware to interface, digitaly, with the real world. This real world to digital interface allows farms of all shapes and sizes to cut cost, and insure profits.

Internal Team Website
Autodesk Related
Created the equivelant of a service marketing website for interla use amongst Autodesk.
This website acts as a base point for the cloud security team of Autodesk to get information about themselves out to fellow employees.
Digital Key Management App
Autodesk Related
Built an app to act as an interface for an already built out code signing framework.
This app helps to ensure the security of digital private key files. This app both on-boards new users and provides an approval system for access to the signing system.
Secure Development Polling Interface
Autodesk Related
This interface polled various managers of app development to ensure secure development procedures were followed.
Various questions are asked through a set of web forms to allow each type of manager to input data during product development. This gave an idea on possible future security concerns.

Client - Team Member

A good friend of mine and I took on a client together as he needed somebody who would be able to program custom plugins for wordpress. As I had plenty of experience, I was able to build out the needed logic to create and manage the flow of the assets accross the site. click here to view the site

First Time Teaching

I am currently

The unexpected is our normal routine. Damage report! I'll alert the crew. Did you come here for something in particular or just general Riker-bashing? Some days you get the bear, and some days the bear gets you. Mr. Worf, you do remember how to fire phasers? The Federation's gone; the Borg is everywhere! Wait a minute - you've been declared dead. You can't give orders around here. Talk about going nowhere fast. Maybe we better talk out here; the observation lounge has turned into a swamp. How long can two people talk about nothing? I think you've let your personal feelings cloud your judgement. You enjoyed that. I am your worst nightmare! We could cause a diplomatic crisis. Take the ship into the Neutral Zone Fate. It protects fools, little children, and ships named "Enterprise." When has justice ever been as simple as a rule book? Yesterday I did not know how to eat gagh. I recommend you don't fire until you're within 40,000 kilometers. Mr. Worf, you sound like a man who's asking his friend if he can start dating his sister.
